Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Liam O'Brien (born May 28, 1976) is an American actor. He voices Yogar Lyste and Morad Sumar in Star Wars Rebels. He also provided various voices for Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan.

O'Brien is a prolific voice actor with over 300 credits across various series. He is known for often voicing villains and has provided voices for the English-language versions of a number of popular anime series. Some of his other notable animated roles have included a recurring role as Red Skull in Marvel's Avengers Assemble, a regular role as Gaara from Naruto, and Jushiro Ukitake in Bleach. O'Brien has also done voice work for many video games, including voicing the main villains in the games Final Fantasy XIII-2 and Eternal Sonata, Caius Ballad and Count Waltz respectively. He performed in World of Warcraft as Illidan Stormrage. He is also a member of Critical Role alongside Travis Willingham, Laura Bailey, Sam Riegel and Matthew Mercer.
